awards.title: President's Endowed Scholarship
awards.description: Awarded to National Merit Finalists and Brown Scholars at Texas A&M, ~ 300 active recipients. Recieved $2k scholarship for academic performance.

awards.title: National Merit Finalist
awards.description: Awarded to top 15,000 scoring in the class of 2025 globally on the PSAT, earning $40,000 in scholarships from Texas A&M.

awards.title: Team Tennis Academic All-State First Team
awards.description: Awarded to top 200 senior tennis players in Texas for elite academic and athletic performance, minimum qualifying cumulative GPA of 92.

awards.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge - International Honorable Mention and Global Nominee
awards.description: FarmVis was named a Global Nominee (top 10% globally) and was designated an Honorable Mention (top 60 projects / 10,000+ submitted)

awards.title: NASA Space Apps Challenge - Houston Regional Winner
awards.description: Worked with partner to build FarmVis - an app leveraging NASA data to empower farmers with data-driven suggestions, nominated for Best Use of Technology and overall winner.

awards.title: AP Scholar with Distinction
awards.description: Awarded by College Board for earning an average score of at least 3.5 on all AP Exams taken, and scores of 3 or higher on five or more of these exams.
